headline: Assurant Vehicle Care Technology Plus Pairs Enhanced Vehicle Protection with Smartphone Repair Benefits
summary: ATLANTA, March 27, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced the launch of Assurant Vehicle Care Technology Plus, a market-leading vehicle service contract (VSC) offering consumers protection for their vehicles and mobile device. For the first time, customers can get comprehensive protection for their vehicle’s high-tech components and
